languages.text: "Они живут мародерством, редкой охотой и грабежом — когда своих собратьев, а когда и окраин ульев. Это племя выродков и дегенератов, варвары, быстро обрастающие своей клановой культурой. Цивилизованные жители ульев отстреливают это отребье при первой возможности".

"They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."
languages.original_text: "Они живут мародерством, редкой охотой и грабежом — когда своих собратьев, а когда и окраин ульев. Это племя выродков и дегенератов, варвары, быстро обрастающие своей клановой культурой. Цивилизованные жители ульев отстреливают это отребье при первой возможности".

traits.locale_text: "They live by marauding, an occasional hunt, and plundering — sometimes their own kin and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly becoming its own clan culture. The civilized residents of the hives shoot those wracks at any chance they get."

"They live by marauding, an occasional hunt, and plundering — sometimes their own kin and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly becoming its own clan culture. The civilized residents of the hives shoot those wracks at any chance they get."

languages.text: “他们靠劫掠与偶尔狩猎为生。他们的狩猎目标有时候是他们自己人，有时候是巢都外围居民。这帮人野蛮而堕落，还在迅速发展他们自己的氏族文化。只要能有机会，巢都内文明世界的居民会毫不犹豫地射杀他们。”
languages.original_text: "They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."

traits.locale_text: “他们靠劫掠与偶尔狩猎为生。他们的狩猎目标有时候是他们自己人，有时候是巢都外围居民。这帮人野蛮而堕落，还在迅速发展他们自己的氏族文化。只要能有机会，巢都内文明时间的居民会毫不犹豫地射杀他们。”
“他们靠劫掠与偶尔狩猎为生。他们的狩猎目标有时候是他们自己人，有时候是巢都外围居民。这帮人野蛮而堕落，还在迅速发展他们自己的氏族文化。只要能有机会，巢都内文明时间的居民会毫不犹豫地射杀他们。”

languages.text: «Viven del saqueo, de la caza ocasional y del pillaje, a veces de su propia familia y a veces de las afueras de las colmenas. Son una tribu de degenerados y bárbaros que está desarrollando rápidamente su propia cultura de clan. Los residentes civilizados de las colmenas disparan a la escoria en cuanto tienen ocasión».
languages.original_text: "They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."

traits.locale_text: «Viven del saqueo, de la caza ocasional y del pillaje, a veces de su propia familia y a veces de las afueras de las colmenas. Son una tribu de degenerados y bárbaros que está desarrollando rápidamente su propia cultura de clan. Los residentes civilizados de las colmenas disparan a la escoria en cuanto tienen ocasión».

languages.text: 「奴らは襲撃、時には狩り、そして略奪によって生計を立てている...その対象は、あるときは自らのキンで、あるときはハイヴ周辺の住人だったりする。奴らは退化した野蛮人の部族で、独自の文化を急速に発展させている。ハイヴに暮らす文明人たちは、チャンスがあればそういったクズどもを撃ち殺しているのだ」
languages.original_text: "They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは襲撃、時には狩り、そして略奪によって生計を立てている...その対象は、あるときは自らのキンで、あるときはハイヴ周辺の住人だったりする。奴らは退化した野蛮人の部族で、独自の文化を急速に発展させている。ハイヴに暮らす文明人たちは、チャンスがあればそういったクズどもを撃ち殺しているのだ」
「奴らは襲撃、時には狩り、そして略奪によって生計を立てている...その対象は、あるときは自らのキンで、あるときはハイヴ周辺の住人だったりする。奴らは退化した野蛮人の部族で、独自の文化を急速に発展させている。ハイヴに暮らす文明人たちは、チャンスがあればそういったクズどもを撃ち殺しているのだ」

languages.text: « Ils vivent de chasse et de rapines, allant parfois jusqu'à voler leurs propres congénères et poussant l'audace jusqu'aux abords des ruches. Ils forment une tribu de dégénérés et de barbares dont la culture se développe rapidement. Chaque fois qu'ils le peuvent, les résidents des ruches les tirent comme des pigeons. »
languages.original_text: "They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."

traits.locale_text: « Ils vivent de chasse et de rapines, allant parfois jusqu'à voler leurs propres congénères et poussant l'audace jusqu'aux abords des ruches. Ils forment une tribu de dégénérés et de barbares dont la culture se développe rapidement. Chaque fois qu'ils le peuvent, les résidents des ruches les tirent comme des pigeons. »

languages.text: "Sie überleben durch Überfälle, gelegentliches Jagen und Plünderungen ... manchmal gegen ihresgleichen, manchmal in den Außenbezirken der Makropolen. Sie sind ein Stamm von Degeneraten und Barbaren, der sich rasant zu einer eigenen Clankultur entwickelt. Die zivilisierten Bewohner der Makropolen erschießen diesen Abschaum, wann immer sich eine Gelegenheit dazu bietet."
languages.original_text: "They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."

Die zivilisierten Bewohner der Makropolen erschießen diesen Abschaum, wann immer sich eine Gelegenheit dazu bietet."

"Sie überleben durch Überfalle, gelegentliches Jagen, durch Plünderungen ... manchmal gegen ihresgleichen, manchmal in den Außenbezirken der Makropolen. Sie sind ein Stamm von Degenerierten und Barbaren, der sich rasant zu einer eigenen Clankultur entwickelt. Die zivilisierten Bewohner der Makropolen erschießen diesen Abschaum, wann immer sich eine Gelegenheit dazu bietet."

languages.text: "Yağmacılıkla, arada çıktıkları avlarla ve soygunculukla hayatlarını sürdürüyorlar. Bazen kendi soydaşlarına, bazen de kovanların dış kısımlarına saldırıyorlar. Bunlar, süratle kendi klan kültürlerini geliştiren bir soysuzlar ve barbarlar kabilesi. Kovanların medeni sakinleri, ellerine geçen her fırsatta bu alçaklara ateş açıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "They live by marauding, occasional hunting, and plundering — sometimes their own kin, and sometimes the outskirts of the hives. They are a tribe of degenerates and barbarians that is rapidly developing its own clan culture. The civilised residents of the hives shoot the scum any chance they get."
